description: This file contains the main route component for the 'notes' section of a web application built with Remix. It manages note listing, creation, updating, deletion, and search functionalities. The file includes loader and action functions for server-side data fetching and mutations, as well as React components for rendering the UI.

methods.name: SearchBar
methods.description: Component rendering a search input for filtering notes based on query and tag.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: Component providing editing interface for a selected note, including title, content, tags, and delete functionality.
